## `gridExtra::grid.arrange`:

::::: {.panel-tabset}

### Code

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(gtable)

p1 <- qplot(mpg, wt, data = mtcars, colour = cyl)
p2 <- qplot(mpg, data = mtcars) + ggtitle("title")
p3 <- qplot(mpg, data = mtcars, geom = "dotplot")

gridExtra::grid.arrange(p2,p3,p1, layout_matrix = rbind(c(3,3),
      c(1,2)))
```

### Output
